system.description: Flames wreathe your body. Choose either a warm shield (fire) or a chill shield (cold). Warm: creatures attacking you with nonreach melee weapons take 1d6+ caster level fire damage. Chill: same but cold damage. You take only half damage from fire (warm) or cold (chill) attacks; if the other type, you take 1-1/2 times normal damage.

components.materialDescription: A bit of phosphorus for the warm shield; a live firefly or glowworm for the chill shield.
